recipe_name: Olive Oil Roasted Eggplant with Lemon
ingredients: 1  large eggplant, 3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil,   salt and pepper to taste, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice
nutrition: Total Fat 10g 13%, Saturated Fat 2g 8%, Sodium 2mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 7g 3%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 3g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 6mg 30%, Calcium 11mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 273mg 6%
